popover.primary: A mastery path focused on immediate damage
A mastery path focused on longer-duration effects
A mastery path focused on wide-area effects

data.name: Annihilate
data.note:
Builds 15 Combustion
Has a chance to cause an Explosion!
data.description: You concentrate on your magical powers for up to 3 seconds, opening your body to serve as a vessel for the raw power of the Red Wind.  The unleashed power will deal 217 Corporeal damage each second to all enemies within 30 feet. This effect will end if you break your concentration, or run out of action points.
data.rawDescription: You concentrate on your magical powers for up to {COM_2_DURA_SECONDS}, opening your body to serve as a vessel for the raw power of the Red Wind.  The unleashed power will deal {COM_3_VAL0_CORPOREALDAMAGE} each second to all enemies within {COM_3_RADI_FEET}. This effect will end if you break your concentration, or run out of action points.

data.name: Backdraft
data.note:
Builds 10 Combustion
Has a chance to cause an Explosion!
data.description: Aqshy, the Wind of Fire, bursts forth explosively around you, dealing 995 Corporeal damage over 15 seconds to all enemies within 30 feet.  The force of the blast will send enemy players flying away from you, while monsters will be knocked down.
data.rawDescription: Aqshy, the Wind of Fire, bursts forth explosively around you, dealing {COM_2_VAL0_TOD_CORPOREALDAMAGE} over {COM_2_DURA_SECONDS} to all enemies within {COM_2_RADI_FEET}.  The force of the blast will send enemy players flying away from you, while monsters will be knocked down.

data.name: Boiling Blood
data.note:
Builds 5 Combustion
Has a chance to cause an Explosion!
data.description: Reduces your target's Willpower by 120 for 10 seconds.  When the effect ends, the victim will suffer 514 Corporeal damage.
data.rawDescription: Reduces your target's Willpower by {COM_2_VAL0} for {COM_2_DURA_SECONDS}.  When the effect ends, the victim will suffer {COM_3_VAL0_CORPOREALDAMAGE}.

data.name: Burn Through
data.description: Fireball and Pyroclastic Surge are now virtually undefendable.
data.rawDescription: Fireball and Pyroclastic Surge are now virtually undefendable.

data.name: Burning Iron
data.note:
Builds 10 Combustion
Has a chance to cause an Explosion!
data.description: Your target's weapons become red hot, dealing 253 Corporeal damage to them and causing them to lose 50 Action Points.
data.rawDescription: Your target's weapons become red hot, dealing {COM_2_VAL0_CORPOREALDAMAGE} to them and causing them to lose {COM_3_VAL0_ACTIONPOINTS}.

data.name: Burnout
data.note: Costs 40 Combustion
data.description: You call upon the Winds Of Magic to grant you power, instantly regaining 160 Action Points.
data.rawDescription: You call upon the Winds Of Magic to grant you power, instantly regaining {COM_0_VAL0_ACTIONPOINTS}.

data.name: Cauterize
data.note: You must be Cursed, Hexed, or Ailing
data.description: You cause an open wound to sear itself shut, removing one Hex, Curse, or Ailment from yourself.
data.rawDescription: You cause an open wound to sear itself shut, removing one Hex, Curse, or Ailment from yourself.

data.name: Choking Smoke
data.note:
Builds 20 Combustion
Has a chance to cause an Explosion!
data.description: A Hex which turns the air into unbreathable smoke and ash, dealing 315 Corporeal damage to your target.  The target and all other enemies within 20 feet become silenced for 3 seconds, making them unable to use magic.
data.rawDescription: A Hex which turns the air into unbreathable smoke and ash, dealing {COM_2_VAL0_CORPOREALDAMAGE} to your target.  The target and all other enemies within {COM_3_RADI_FEET} become silenced for {COM_3_DURA_SECONDS}, making them unable to use magic.

data.name: Close Quarters
data.description: Your cast times are reduced to 50% when you are within 20 feet of your target.
data.rawDescription: Your cast times are reduced to {COM_0_VAL0}% when you are within 20 feet of your target.

data.name: Conflagration of Doom
data.description: A spot that you select bursts into flames for 8 seconds, dealing 300 damage each second to all enemies within 20 feet.
data.rawDescription: A spot that you select bursts into flames for {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}, dealing {COM_1_VAL0_DAMAGE} each second to all enemies within {COM_1_RADI_FEET}.

data.name: Crown of Fire
data.description: Flames of Rhuin now has a 75% chance to trigger.
data.rawDescription: Flames of Rhuin now has a 75% chance to trigger.

data.name: Detonate
data.note:
Target must be Hexed
Builds 25 Combustion
Has a chance to cause an Explosion!
data.description: You reach through the power of a Hex on the target to instantly deal 220 Elemental damage to them, and an additional 336 Elemental damage over 9 seconds to them and all other enemies within 20 feet.
data.rawDescription: You reach through the power of a Hex on the target to instantly deal {COM_2_VAL0_ELEMENTALDAMAGE} to them, and an additional {COM_3_VAL0_COM_0_VAL0_TOD_ELEMENTALDAMAGE} over {COM_3_VAL0_COM_0_DURA_SECONDS} to them and all other enemies within {COM_3_VAL0_COM_0_RADI_FEET}.

data.name: Devour Energy
data.description: Whenever one of your spells hits an enemy, you have a 25% chance to regain 30 Action Points. This effect cannot occur more than once every 2 seconds.
data.rawDescription: Whenever one of your spells hits an enemy, you have a 25% chance to regain {COM_1_VAL0_ACTIONPOINTS}. This effect cannot occur more than once every {COM_2_VAL0_COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.name: Distracting Fires
data.description: Reduces the cooldown times of Smoke Screen and Fire Cage by 7 seconds.
data.rawDescription: Reduces the cooldown times of Smoke Screen and Fire Cage by {COM_0_VAL0_SECONDS}.

data.name: Draining Burn
data.description: Burning Iron will now deal 403 damage, and you will regain 50 action points when it hits.
data.rawDescription: Burning Iron will now deal {ABIL_8173_COM_4_VAL0_DAMAGE}, and you will regain 50 action points when it hits.

data.name: Embrace The Flames
data.description: Any time you critically hit an enemy with a direct damage ability, you will gain 75 points of Morale. This effect will not trigger more than once every 3 seconds.
data.rawDescription: Any time you critically hit an enemy with a direct damage ability, you will gain {COM_1_VAL0} points of Morale. This effect will not trigger more than once every 3 seconds.

data.name: Emperor's Ward
data.description:
Any time you are attacked, there is a 25% chance that you will become protected by a magical barrier for up to 10 seconds, which will absorb up to 375 damage.
This effect will not trigger more than once every 3 seconds.
data.rawDescription:
Any time you are attacked, there is a 25% chance that you will become protected by a magical barrier for up to {COM_1_VAL0_COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}, which will absorb up to {COM_1_VAL0_COM_0_VAL1_DAMAGE}.
This effect will not trigger more than once every 3 seconds.

data.name: Endless Knowledge
data.description: Increases your Intelligence by 160.
data.rawDescription: Increases your Intelligence by {COM_0_VAL0}.

data.name: Explosive Force
data.description: Any time that your Combustion causes an Explosion, the blast will also deal 50% of the damage to all enemies within 30 feet of you.
data.rawDescription: Any time that your Combustion causes an Explosion, the blast will also deal 50% of the damage to all enemies within {ABIL_301_COM_5_RADI_FEET} of you.

data.name: Fan The Flames
data.description: Increases the radii of Rain Of Fire and Detonate by 50%.
data.rawDescription: Increases the radii of Rain Of Fire and Detonate by {COM_0_VAL1}%.

data.name: Fiery Blast
data.note:
Builds 20 Combustion
Has a chance to cause an Explosion!
data.description: You fling a massive ball of fire, dealing 516 Elemental damage to your target and all other enemies within 20 feet of them.
data.rawDescription: You fling a massive ball of fire, dealing {COM_4_VAL0_ELEMENTALDAMAGE} to your target and all other enemies within {COM_4_RADI_FEET} of them.

data.name: Fiery Reserves
data.description: Reduces the cooldown times of Flame Breath and Rain Of Fire by 10 seconds.
data.rawDescription: Reduces the cooldown times of Flame Breath and Rain Of Fire by {COM_0_VAL0_SECONDS}.

data.name: Fire Cage
data.description: All enemies within 30 feet are Rooted as they become trapped within a cage of searing flames, making them unable to move for 5 seconds.  Rooted targets have a 50% chance to break free when they suffer damage.
data.rawDescription: All enemies within {COM_0_RADI_FEET} are Rooted as they become trapped within a cage of searing flames, making them unable to move for {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}.  Rooted targets have a 50% chance to break free when they suffer damage.

data.name: Fireball
data.note:
Builds 10 Combustion
Has a chance to cause an Explosion!
data.description: You conjure up a fiery missile which slams into your target, dealing 733 Elemental damage.
data.rawDescription: You conjure up a fiery missile which slams into your target, dealing {COM_2_VAL0_ELEMENTALDAMAGE}.

data.name: Fireball Barrage
data.note:
Builds 15 Combustion
Has a chance to cause an Explosion!
data.description: You assault your target with a constant stream of fireballs, striking them up to 3 times over 3 seconds.  Each blast deals 483 Elemental damage to your target, and 242 Elemental damage to all other enemies within 10 feet of them.  This effect will end if you break your concentration or run out of action points.
data.rawDescription: You assault your target with a constant stream of fireballs, striking them up to 3 times over {COM_2_DURA_SECONDS}.  Each blast deals {COM_2_VAL0_ELEMENTALDAMAGE} to your target, and {ABIL_3150_COM_0_VAL0_ELEMENTALDAMAGE} to all other enemies within {COM_3_RADI_FEET} of them.  This effect will end if you break your concentration or run out of action points.

data.name: Flame Breath
data.note:
Builds 20 Combustion
Has a chance to cause an Explosion!
data.description: You momentarily turn your very breath into a rolling burst of flames, dealing 708 Elemental damage over 9 seconds to all enemies in a cone in front of you, up to 40 feet away.
data.rawDescription: You momentarily turn your very breath into a rolling burst of flames, dealing {COM_2_VAL0_TOD_ELEMENTALDAMAGE} over {COM_2_DURA_SECONDS} to all enemies in a cone in front of you, up to {COM_2_RADI_FEET} away.

data.name: Flame Shield
data.description: All groupmates within 100 feet are Enchanted with a protective shield of flickering flames for 1 hour, giving them a 25% chance to deal 187 Elemental damage back against the attacker when they are struck by a melee attack.
data.rawDescription: All groupmates within 100 feet are Enchanted with a protective shield of flickering flames for 1 hour, giving them a 25% chance to deal {COM_1_VAL0_ELEMENTALDAMAGE} back against the attacker when they are struck by a melee attack.

data.name: Flames of Rhuin
data.description: An Enchantment which infuses your groupmates within 100 feet of you with the spirit of fire for 1 hour, giving them a 25% chance to deal an additional 225 Elemental damage any time they attack a target.
data.rawDescription: An Enchantment which infuses your groupmates within 100 feet of you with the spirit of fire for 1 hour, giving them a 25% chance to deal an additional {COM_1_VAL0_ELEMENTALDAMAGE} any time they attack a target.

data.name: Flashfire
data.description:
Any time an enemy disrupts one of your spells, your next spell within the next 10 seconds which would normally have a buildup time will cast instantly instead.
This effect will not trigger more than once every 6 seconds.
data.rawDescription:
Any time an enemy disrupts one of your spells, your next spell within the next {COM_1_VAL0_COM_0_DURA_SECONDS} which would normally have a buildup time will cast instantly instead.
This effect will not trigger more than once every 6 seconds.

data.name: Flee
data.description:
You run away from the battle in a mad panic, increasing your run speed by 30 for 10 seconds. You immediately lose all of your action points, any career mechanic points, and your Morale will begin to drop, and you will not begin to regain action points until 10 seconds have passed.

You can use this ability again to cancel the effect early, but you will still remain panicked and will not regain action points for the full duration.
data.rawDescription:
You run away from the battle in a mad panic, increasing your run speed by {COM_0_VAL0} for {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}. You immediately lose all of your action points, any career mechanic points, and your Morale will begin to drop, and you will not begin to regain action points until {COM_4_VAL0_COM_0_DURA_SECONDS} have passed.

You can use this ability again to cancel the effect early, but you will still remain panicked and will not regain action points for the full duration.

data.name: Focused Mind
data.description: For the next 10 seconds, you will remove and ignore any rooting, snaring, disarming, silencing or disabling effects. Your cast times are reduced by 50%, and you cannot be set back.
data.rawDescription: For the next 10 seconds, you will remove and ignore any rooting, snaring, disarming, silencing or disabling effects. Your cast times are reduced by 50%, and you cannot be set back.

data.name: Fuel To The Fire
data.description: Boiling Blood's Willpower debuff is increased to 360 for 5 seconds and will deal 767 Corporeal damage at the end of the debuff duration.
data.rawDescription: Boiling Blood's Willpower debuff is increased to {ABIL_8165_COM_4_VAL0} for {ABIL_8165_COM_4_DURA_SECONDS} and will deal {ABIL_8165_COM_5_VAL0_CORPOREALDAMAGE} at the end of the debuff duration.

data.name: Fueled From Within
data.description: Flames Of Rhuin will now deal 337 damage, and Flame Shield will now deal 300 damage.
data.rawDescription: Flames Of Rhuin will now deal {ABIL_8164_COM_2_VAL0_DAMAGE}, and Flame Shield will now deal {ABIL_8161_COM_2_VAL0_DAMAGE}.

data.name: Funnel Power
data.description: You become a living conduit for the power of the Red Wind of Magic, causing all of your directly damaging magical attacks to deal an additional 150 Corporeal damage to your target, but you will also suffer 75 damage for each one.  Use this ability again to turn it off.
data.rawDescription: You become a living conduit for the power of the Red Wind of Magic, causing all of your directly damaging magical attacks to deal an additional {COM_1_VAL0_CORPOREALDAMAGE} to your target, but you will also suffer {COM_2_VAL0_DAMAGE} for each one.  Use this ability again to turn it off.

data.name: Heart of Fire
data.description: Removes all Hexes and Curses from you.  You regain 1735 health over 15 seconds.
data.rawDescription: Removes all Hexes and Curses from you.  You regain {COM_0_VAL0_TOD_HEALTH} over {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.name: Ignite
data.note:
Builds 5 Combustion
Has a chance to cause an Explosion!

data.rawDescription: A Hex which causes your target to burst into flames, dealing {COM_2_VAL0_TOD_ELEMENTALDAMAGE} to them over {COM_2_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.name: Ignition
data.description: The cost of Ignite is reduced by 20 and it will reduce the enemy's Corporeal resistance by 236 for 9 seconds.
data.rawDescription: The cost of Ignite is reduced by {COM_1_VAL1} and it will reduce the enemy's Corporeal resistance by {ABIL_8158_COM_3_VAL0} for {ABIL_8158_COM_3_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.name: Lingering Fires
data.description: Pyroclastic Surge and Scorched Earth gain a 25% chance to cause an additional 350 Elemental damage over 5 seconds to each target hit.
data.rawDescription: Pyroclastic Surge and Scorched Earth gain a 25% chance to cause an additional {ABIL_3350_COM_0_VAL0_TOD_ELEMENTALDAMAGE} over {ABIL_3350_COM_0_DURA_SECONDS} to each target hit.

data.name: Mage Bolt
data.description: A focused blast that deals 600 damage and knocks the targeted player away. Monsters will be knocked down.
data.rawDescription: A focused blast that deals {COM_0_VAL0_DAMAGE} and knocks the targeted player away. Monsters will be knocked down.

data.name: Magic Dart
data.description: Deals 600 damage to your target immediately, and another 1206 damage over 9 seconds.
data.rawDescription: Deals {COM_0_VAL0_DAMAGE} to your target immediately, and another {COM_1_VAL0_TOD_DAMAGE} over {COM_1_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.name: Meltdown
data.note: Consumes all Combustion
data.description:
You expel all of your build-up Combustion in a fiery blast, dealing damage to your target based on the amount of Combustion that was consumed.
1 - 10 Combustion: 75 damage.
11 - 30 Combustion: 150 damage.
31 - 70 Combustion: 300 damage.
71 - 90 Combustion: 600 damage.
91 - 100 Combustion: 750 damage.
data.rawDescription:
You expel all of your build-up Combustion in a fiery blast, dealing damage to your target based on the amount of Combustion that was consumed.
1 - 10 Combustion: {COM_0_VAL0_DAMAGE}.
11 - 30 Combustion: {COM_1_VAL0_DAMAGE}.
31 - 70 Combustion: {COM_2_VAL0_DAMAGE}.
71 - 90 Combustion: {COM_3_VAL0_DAMAGE}.
91 - 100 Combustion: {COM_4_VAL0_DAMAGE}.

data.name: Misdirection
data.description: You gain a strong counter aura for the next 10 seconds that will reduce half of any incoming Magic damage and redirect half of any direct damage back to the caster.
data.rawDescription: You gain a strong counter aura for the next {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS} that will reduce half of any incoming Magic damage and redirect half of any direct damage back to the caster.

data.name: Nova
data.note:
Builds 40 Combustion
Has a chance to cause an Explosion!
data.description: A powerful spell which makes your target spontaneously combust, dealing 478 Elemental damage to them.
data.rawDescription: A powerful spell which makes your target spontaneously combust, dealing {COM_2_VAL0_ELEMENTALDAMAGE} to them.

data.name: Playing With Fire
data.description: A Hex which surrounds the target with hungry flames, causing all healing used on them for the next 10 seconds to become 50% less effective.  Each time someone attempts to use a direct heal on them, the flames will lash out, and healer will suffer 375 Elemental damage.
data.rawDescription: A Hex which surrounds the target with hungry flames, causing all healing used on them for the next {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS} to become 50% less effective.  Each time someone attempts to use a direct heal on them, the flames will lash out, and healer will suffer {COM_2_VAL0_ELEMENTALDAMAGE}.

data.name: Power From The Ashes
data.description: Meltdown will now restore your action points, returning an amount equal to the Combustion which was expended.
data.rawDescription: Meltdown will now restore your action points, returning an amount equal to the Combustion which was expended.

data.name: Pyroclastic Surge
data.note:
Builds 10 Combustion
Has a chance to cause an Explosion!
data.description: A fountain of molten lava envelops your target, dealing 437 Corporeal damage.  If they are Hexed, then they will also be inflicted with a disorienting Hex for 3 seconds, causing all of their actions to take an additional 50% longer to build up.
data.rawDescription: A fountain of molten lava envelops your target, dealing {COM_2_VAL0_CORPOREALDAMAGE}.  If they are Hexed, then they will also be inflicted with a disorienting Hex for {COM_3_DURA_SECONDS}, causing all of their actions to take an additional {COM_3_VAL0}% longer to build up.

data.name: Rain of Fire
data.note:
Builds 15 Combustion
Has a chance to cause an Explosion!

data.rawDescription: You call down a shower of flames from the Winds Of Magic that rains down for the next {COM_2_DURA_SECONDS}, falling upon a spot you select and repeatedly dealing {COM_4_VAL0_DAMAGE} to all enemies within {COM_3_RADI_FEET} of that spot.

data.name: Ruin And Destruction

data.rawDescription: Deals {COM_0_VAL0_DAMAGE} to all enemies within {COM_0_RADI_FEET}.

data.name: Scintillating Energy

data.rawDescription: You send a blast of heat into the ground around you, dealing {COM_2_VAL0_CORPOREALDAMAGE} to all enemies within {COM_2_RADI_FEET}.

Builds 25 Combustion
Has a chance to cause an Explosion!

data.rawDescription: Causes a pillar of scalding gas to erupt from the ground, dealing {COM_2_VAL0_ELEMENTALDAMAGE} to your target.

data.name: Searing Vitality
data.description: Sear will now heal you for 67% of the damage that it deals.
data.rawDescription: Sear will now heal you for 67% of the damage that it deals.

data.name: Shield of Aqshy
data.description: An Enchantment which calls upon the power of the Red Wind to increase your armor by 990 for 10 seconds, and makes it 50% less likely that you will be set back while building up abilities.
data.rawDescription: An Enchantment which calls upon the power of the Red Wind to increase your armor by {COM_1_VAL0} for {COM_1_DURA_SECONDS}, and makes it {COM_0_VAL1}% less likely that you will be set back while building up abilities.

data.name: Sigmar's Favor
data.description: Any time that you are healed by a direct heal, there is a 25% chance that you will regain an additional 135 hit points as well.
data.rawDescription: Any time that you are healed by a direct heal, there is a 25% chance that you will regain an additional {COM_1_VAL0_COM_0_VAL0} hit points as well.

data.name: Siphon Power
data.description: You drain power from your target, stealing up to 200 action points from your target and giving them to you. Your target's Intelligence will also be reduced by 160 for 30 seconds.
data.rawDescription: You drain power from your target, stealing up to 200 action points from your target and giving them to you. Your target's Intelligence will also be reduced by {COM_2_VAL0} for 30 seconds.

data.name: Sleight of Hand
data.description: Enemy monsters will hate you 50% less than normal.
data.rawDescription: Enemy monsters will hate you {COM_0_VAL1}% less than normal.

data.name: Slow Boil
data.note:
Builds 10 Combustion
Has a chance to cause an Explosion!
data.description: For the next 5 seconds, the target is inflicted with a Hex which raises their temperature to a delirious fever, causing them to lose 6 Action Points every 1 seconds.  When this effect ends, they will suffer 315 Corporeal damage as the fever peaks.

When this effect ends, they will suffer {COM_3_VAL0_CORPOREALDAMAGE} as the fever peaks.

data.name: Smoke Screen
data.description: You Detaunt your target by surrounding them with thick smoke, making them hate you less and causing them to deal only 50% damage to you for 15 seconds. You will also deal 50% damage to them until the effect is broken. If you attack anyone that you have Detaunted, the effect will immediately end.

data.name: Smoldering Embers
data.description: When Ignite, Boiling Blood, and Slow Boil end or are removed, there is a 25% chance that they will re-kindle, reapplying themselves to the target once again.  Be cautious, though, for you will build Combustion and have a chance to cause an Explosion each time that they are reapplied!

Be cautious, though, for you will build Combustion and have a chance to cause an Explosion each time that they are reapplied!

data.description: Deals 1800 damage to all enemies within 30 feet, and knocks them away from you.
data.rawDescription: Deals {COM_0_VAL0_DAMAGE} to all enemies within {COM_0_RADI_FEET}, and knocks them away from you.

data.description: Increases your Spirit resistance by 252.

data.name: Wildfire

data.name: Withering Heat

Builds 15 Combustion
Has a chance to cause an Explosion!
data.description: You turn the air around your enemy into a grasping storm of burning flames for up to 6 seconds, dealing up to 1772 Corporeal damage and snaring them, reducing their run speed by 40%.  This effect will end if you break your concentration, or run out of action points.
data.rawDescription: You turn the air around your enemy into a grasping storm of burning flames for up to {COM_2_DURA_SECONDS}, dealing up to {COM_2_VAL0_TOD_CORPOREALDAMAGE} and snaring them, reducing their run speed by {COM_3_VAL0_COM_0_VAL0}%.  This effect will end if you break your concentration, or run out of action points.
